name: Parachute (itch) (richthedev)
description:
A simple skydiving game, designed and hand-drawned by my son, programmed by me 😎. Try to get the highest score by landing on the moving boat.

Controls:

  • Jump / Open parachute: Spacebar / A button
  • Glide left / right: A-D keys / Left-Right arrows / Left stick
  • Reset game: R key / Y button
